sentences.english: How much wood would a woodchuck chuck.
In this paper the characteristics of histological structure of marmot skin fronl Gansu province was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文對甘肅地區旱獺皮組織結構特點進行了研究。

sentences.english: A ground hog looks like a beaver with thick, brownish-gray hair.
sentences.chinese: 美洲旱獺看起來像長着濃密的灰褐色毛的河狸。

sentences.english: Have you ever heard of Ground-hog Day?
sentences.chinese: 你聽說過美洲旱獺節嗎？
